dialogue: Let’s go! Two lines. On the back. Ladder up!
Sir, please! My husband’s inside!
Sir, my husband’s inside! Inside.
What’s that?
My husband’s inside… He thought he heard voices crying for help.
Give me two lines on the back side, guys. Okay.
And he went into the house trying to save whomever was trapped by the fire.
Okay… okay. Get back in your car, do not go over there… Please, ma’am. Is there someone else?
Okay… No, I don’t know…
Ladder up, guys! Ladder up! There’s a civilian inside! Get back in your car…
I’m sorry. There was nothing we could do.
He didn’t get to the second floor, he must have passed out from the smoke and the flames.
And the other bodies?
There was no one else. The house has been abandoned for a long time. There was only your husband.
But he… he told me that he heard screams for help…
Impossible. There was no one else…
It’s true. I didn’t hear the screams either. I tried to stop
There was nobody. I’m sorry. He was very brave. Tim, can we get someone to accompany her home?
I want to go with him. I’ll follow you.
Tim, you drive the lady’s car, and follow us back to the station.
